title: Ancient Shrine
text: {hero} discovers an ancient shrine glowing with mystical energy. As they approach, the shrine pulses with power and channels energy into them!

title: Cursed Artifact
text: {hero} finds a strange artifact emanating dark energy. Unable to resist, they touch it and feel a draining force sap their vitality!

title: Mysterious Merchant
text: {hero} encounters a hooded merchant who offers a powerful item in exchange for... nothing. Suspicious, but {hero} accepts the gift.

title: Healing Fountain
text: {hero} stumbles upon a pristine fountain with crystal-clear water. Drinking from it, they feel their wounds close and energy return!

title: Trapped Chamber
text: {hero} triggers a hidden trap! Poisoned darts shoot from the walls, and a blade swings from the ceiling. {hero} barely escapes but sustains injuries.

title: Wandering Master
text: {hero} meets a wandering master who offers to teach advanced techniques. After a brief training session, {hero} feels their abilities grow stronger!

title: Hidden Treasure
text: {hero} discovers a hidden cache left behind by previous adventurers. Inside, they find valuable equipment!

title: Memory Crystal
text: {hero} touches a glowing memory crystal. Visions flood their mind as forgotten techniques replace old knowledge. Their abilities shift!

title: Dark Ritual Site
text: {hero} interrupts a dark ritual in progress. The backlash damages them, but they absorb some of the dark energy, strengthening their abilities.

title: Meditation Chamber
text: {hero} finds a peaceful chamber filled with incense. Meditating here, they achieve clarity and inner peace, fully restoring their vitality.

title: Abandoned Armory
text: {hero} discovers an abandoned armory with racks of equipment. Most is rusted, but one piece catches their eye...

title: Poison Gas Leak
text: {hero} enters a room filled with toxic fumes. They hold their breath and escape, but not before inhaling some of the poison.

title: Moment of Clarity
text: {hero} has a sudden moment of clarity. All their training comes together, and they achieve mastery over one of their abilities!

title: Blessed Statue
text: {hero} prays at a statue of an ancient hero. The statue glows and blesses {hero} with divine energy, healing their wounds and strengthening their resolve.

title: Unstable Floor
text: {hero} steps on an unstable floor that gives way! They fall into a spike pit below. Climbing out, battered and bleeding...
